title: information discloure via logs files at ==> https://ihelp.mtnbusiness.com/logfiles/Log_21-06-2021.txt
content:
Hi MTN team ,
i got a 500 error show the full path of the windows server containing the log file of today
i navigate to it ==> https://ihelp.mtnbusiness.com/logfiles/Log_21-06-2021.txt
i saw all logins i made with user administrator
as u see the logs files is a date Log_21-06-2021.txt
you can read every day logs via manipulate the file name :)
Impact
Ability to see login logs
steps: Encounter a 500 error on the website that reveals the full path of the Windows server log file.
Navigate to the log file URL by manipulating the date in the filename (e.g., https://ihelp.mtnbusiness.com/logfiles/Log_21-06-2021.txt).
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves an information disclosure issue where log files containing sensitive login information are accessible by simply manipulating the date in the log file's URL. This allows an attacker to view historical login logs without authentication.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it only requires observing a server error revealing the log file path and then manipulating the URL to access different log files. There are no complex interactions or states involved.
